contentrichtext.text: '''Gill''' is a rural [[unincorporated area|unincorporated community]] in south central [[Harrison County, Texas|Harrison County]], [[Texas]], [[United States]]. It is six miles south of the county seat, [[Marshall, Texas|Marshall]], on [[U.S. Route 59]]. ==External links== * {{Gnis|1379833|Gill, Texas}} {{Harrison County, Texas}} {{coord|32|23|35|N|94|20|28|W|type:city_region:US-TX|display=title}} [[Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas]] [[Category:Populated places in Harrison County, Texas]] {{HarrisonTX-geo-stub}}
